name: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: 2 8oz packages cream cheese, softened 1/4 cup green pepper, minced
1 8.5oz crushed pineapple, drained 1 Tbsp seasoning salt
2 Tbsp green onion, finely chopped 1 c pecans chopped (optional)
steps: Make sure you drain all the juice from the pineapple. Combined everything but the pecans and mix with a wooden
spoon. Refrigerate several hours. Shape into ball or log and roll in pecans
